review: Works great and fast connectionsVery happy
author: pat Besch

review: Finally, I can take full advantage of all my Amazon Prime benefits. I was frustrated because my DVD player didn't support Amazon Prime video streaming, but the Fire TV Stick solved the problem. It was easy to install and is easy to use. Of course, you have to add one more remote to your collection, but that's OK. So far, the streaming has been flawless and the picture and sound quality are A-OK.
author: Lainey SoCal

review: Very easy to set up. Virtually plug and play. I have had it for a couple of days and am impressed.
author: Louis Herzner

review: Amazon's Fire TV Stick works so well that I have cancelled my premium cable TV channels and only have basic TV.  Fire TV Stick saves me a lot of money every month.
author: Amazon Customer

review: A very good item, and easy to use, thank you
author: Alicia Ramirez

review: What an amazing add-on! Easy to install and use. My old TV is now functional again. I down loaded the app for my iPhone and can speak my requests into my phone and the Fire Stick responds to my verbal commands. All for $39!
author: Sandi C

review: I order one five stick,I got two and was changed for two. I will be mailing one back please put my money back I MY account.Thank you I Love all your products.
author: Yolanda Bailey
